author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: I want all of this to be under version 0.1. It is not a mistake or something. I just wanted to make my first release of the package better. Thanks!

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/juliamatlab/MatLang/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- a9440180-f05a-11e9-9ddc-3b8ee64def3d -->
